panels.description: Approximate count of Temporal Cloud Actions per-second. Use `namespace_mode` to filter for active/standby actions for multi-region namespaces. More information about [billable actions](https://docs.temporal.io/cloud/pricing#action).
panels.title: Actions

panels.description: Workflows that successfully completed.
panels.title: Workflow Success

panels.description: Workflows that timed out before completing execution.
panels.title: Workflow Timeouts

panels.description: Workflows that failed before completion.
panels.title: Workflow Failed

panels.description: Workflow Executions that were Continued-As-New from a past execution.
panels.title: Workflow Continued as New

panels.description: Workflows terminated before completing execution.
panels.title: Workflow Terminations

panels.description: Workflows canceled before completing execution.
panels.title: Workflow Cancellations

panels.description: Successful execution of a Scheduled Workflow.
panels.title: Successful Schedule Actions

panels.description: When average schedule run length is greater than average schedule interval while a buffer_all overlap policy is configured.
panels.title: Schedule Buffer Overruns

panels.description: Skipped Scheduled executions when Workflows were delayed longer than the catchup window.
panels.title: Schedule Missed Catchup Windows

panels.description: Workflows that were delayed due to exceeding a rate limit.
panels.title: Schedules Rate Limited

panels.description:
The Sync Match Rate measures the rate of Tasks that can be delivered to Workers without having to be persisted (Workers are up and available to pick them up) to the rate of all delivered Tasks. [more info](https://docs.temporal.io/production-deployment/cloud/worker-health#sync-match-rate)

Should always be near 100%.
panels.title: Sync Match Rate

panels.description: Tasks that are successfully matched to a poller.
panels.title: Worker Poll Success

panels.description: Tasks that are successfully sync matched to a poller.
panels.title: Worker Poll Success Sync

panels.description: Tasks that are successfully async matched to a poller.
panels.title: Worker Poll Success Async

panels.description:
Successful task matching to poller
/
All polling requests (including timeouts)
panels.title: Poll Success Rate

panels.description: When no tasks are available for a poller before timing out. If this is high, you may have too many pollers.
panels.title: Worker Poll Timeout

panels.description: A count of gRPC requests received aggregated by operation.
panels.title: Frontend Service Requests

panels.description: Count of gRPC errors returned aggregated by operation, including resource exhausted errors.
panels.title: Frontend Service Errors

panels.description: Should generally be under 200ms
panels.title: StartWorkflowExecution Latency

panels.description: Should generally be under 200ms
panels.title: SignalWorkflowExecution Latency

panels.description: Should generally be under 200ms
panels.title: SignalWithStartWorkflowExecution Latency

panels.description: The transmission delay of Workflow updates and history events from the primary to the replica. [more info](https://docs.temporal.io/cloud/high-availability/monitor#metrics)
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: [Billable actions](https://docs.temporal.io/cloud/pricing#action) split across active/standby namespaces for multi region namespaces.
panels.title: Actions

panels.description: Count of state transitions for each Namespace.
panels.title: State Transitions
